p.s: The given text is an excerpt of Barack Obama's Speechspeech on the American Dream during his first election campaign on November 7th 2007 in Bettendorf, Iowa.
Obama talks about how he is travelling around the country and how impressed he's been by the values and hopes everybody shares.
He continues by talking about his grandfather's story how he was treated after he had fought in World War II.
Then he mentions his mother and that American Dream allowed her to raise him and his sister well.
He finishes by explaining why he became a community organizer and how he had seen how the American Dream was slipping away.
